description:
Move IME shortcut keys from X to Aura [part 3 of 3].

- chrome/browser/ui/views/aura/ime_controller_chromeos.cc
- chrome/browser/ui/views/aura/ime_controller_chromeos.h

New files. The class implements the ash::ImeControlDelegate interface and calls chromeos::input_method::InputMethodManager functions.

- chrome/browser/chrome_browser_main_extra_parts_aura.cc

Create and register an ImeController object.

- chrome/browser/chromeos/system_key_event_listener.cc

Remove code for checking IME hotkeys.

- chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc
- chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.h

Make SwitchToPreviousInputMethod() public (no code change). Add SwitchInputMethod(). Add browser_tests for them.

BUG=110408
TEST=ran browser_tests


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=122724

messages.text:
Zach, could you review chrome/browser/chromeos/ part?

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc
File chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc (left):

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc#oldcode1251
chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc:1251: void SwitchToPreviousInputMethod() {
moved to public: area.

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc
File chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc#newcode642
chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc:642: virtual bool SwitchInputMethod(const ui::Accelerator& accelerator) {
I know this new function is very similar to the existing one, SwitchToInputMethod() which is for non-Aura Chrome OS, but I'll remove the old one soon (when R18 Chrome OS is released).

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/hotkey_manager.h
File chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/hotkey_manager.h (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/hotkey_manager.h#newcode20
chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/hotkey_manager.h:20: // TODO(yusukes): Remove this class when R18 Chrome OS is released.
Could you add a tracking bug and reference it here?

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc
File chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc#newcode1539
chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/input_method_manager.cc:1539: // true when IME hotkeys should be ignored.
Change this comment to explain the relationship to EnableHotkeys()

please take another look

http://codereview.chromium.org/9369067/diff/8002/chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/hotkey_manager.h
File chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/hotkey_manager.h (right):

chrome/browser/chromeos/input_method/hotkey_manager.h:20: // TODO(yusukes): Remove this class when R18 Chrome OS is released.

Done.

On 2012/02/17 07:26:28, Zachary Kuznia wrote:

Done.

+ben

Ben, could you do an OWNERS review for 	 chrome/browser/ui/views/?

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
